title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Advanced Internet: Google Tricks, Deep Web, and Resurrecting the Dead
description: A guide to advanced Google searching techniques, including using phrases, OR, +, -, ~, and * operators, as well as calculator, stock quotes, lyrics, maps, phone directory search, and weather functions.
